title: SCICON Cuts Astana Contract Over ‘Ethics’: Mark Cavendish Won’t Wear Its Glasses
content:
SCICON has dropped the entire Astana team from its sponsorship roster. That’s because the recently-signed Mark Cavendish will not wear the Italian sunglasses — instead…

The post SCICON Cuts Astana Contract Over ‘Ethics’: Mark Cavendish Won’t Wear Its Glasses appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
